FuncDef:
The reflect between-clients command enables route reflection among clients.
The undo reflect between-clients command disables route reflection among clients. If the clients of an RR are fully meshed, you can disable route reflection between the clients to reduce the cost. The reflect between-clients command enables route reflection among clients. The undo reflect between-clients command disables route reflection among clients. If the clients of an RR are fully meshed, you can disable route reflection between the clients to reduce the cost. By default, route reflection among clients through the RR is enabled.
ExtraInfo: On some networks, if the clients of an RR establish full-mesh connections with each other, they can directly exchange routing information. Route reflection among clients through the RR is unnecessary. The undo reflect between-clients command can be used to prohibit the clients from reflecting routes to each other to reduce costs.
